summary: This is an email chain from April 29, 2020, between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a call to discuss forfeiture issues related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing legal work on asset forfeiture matters after Epstein's death.

events.title: Scheduling call on Epstein forfeiture issues
events.description: Email exchange to schedule a call between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel to discuss forfeiture issues related to the Epstein case.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively working on forfeiture issues related to the Epstein case as of April 29, 2020.
The email chain shows coordination among legal personnel to discuss specific Epstein case matters.
The document references an 'Epstein team' within the U.S. Attorney's Office handling these issues.
